fields.name: INFO_DP
fields.desc: Total read depth; only low coverage data were counted towards the DP, exome data were not used

fields.name: INFO_OLD_VARIANT
fields.desc: old variant location. Format chrom:position:REF_allele/ALT_allele

fields.name: INFO_IMPRECISE
fields.desc: Imprecise variant

fields.name: INFO_MULTI_ALLELIC
fields.desc: Position/site is multi-allelic in 1000 genomes results (phase 3)

fields.name: INFO_AMR_AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in the AMR populations calculated from AC and AN, in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_EUR_AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in the EUR populations calculated from AC and AN, in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_TSD
fields.desc: Precise Target Site Duplication for bases, if unknown, value will be NULL

fields.name: INFO_NS
fields.desc: Number of samples with data

fields.name: INFO_SAS_AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in the SAS populations calculated from AC and AN, in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_CIPOS
fields.desc: Confidence interval near the end of imprecise variant

fields.name: REF
fields.desc: The value in the POS field refers to the position of the first base in the String.

fields.name: INFO_EX_TARGET
fields.desc: Variant in exon pull down target boundaries

fields.name: POS
fields.desc: The reference position.

fields.name: INFO_SVLEN
fields.desc: SV length. It is only calculated for structural variation MEIs. For other types of SVs, one may calculate the SV length by INFO:END-START+1, or by finding the difference between lengthes of REF and ALT alleles

fields.name: INFO_MC
fields.desc: Merged calls.

fields.name: INFO_AA_1
fields.desc: Ancestral reference as in vcf format. For InDels only

fields.name: CHROM
fields.desc: Chromosome identifier.

fields.name: INFO_EAS_AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in the EAS populations calculated from AC and AN, in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_AN
fields.desc: Total number of alleles in called genotypes

fields.name: INFO_END
fields.desc: End position

fields.name: INFO_AF
fields.desc: Estimated allele frequency in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_AC
fields.desc: Total number of alternate alleles in called genotypes

fields.name: INFO_CS
fields.desc: Source call set.

fields.name: ID
fields.desc: Semi-colon separated list of unique identifiers where available.

fields.name: INFO_AFR_AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in the AFR populations calculated from AC and AN, in the range (0,1)

fields.name: INFO_MEINFO
fields.desc: Mobile element info of the form NAME,START,END<POLARITY; If there is only 5' OR 3' support for this call, will be NULL NULL for START and END

fields.name: INFO_CIEND
fields.desc: Confidence interval near the end of imprecise variant

fields.name: INFO_AA_0
fields.desc: Inferred using multiple alignment with Ortheus. For SNPs only

fields.name: INFO_AA_3
fields.desc: Ancestral indel type

fields.name: INFO_AA_2
fields.desc: Ancestral alternative allele as in vcf format. For InDels only

fields.name: ALT
fields.desc: Comma separated list of alternate non-reference alleles called on at least one of the samples.

fields.name: INFO_SVTYPE
fields.desc: Type of structural variant

fields.name: INFO_VT
fields.desc: SNP, INDEL, SV
